name: Starry Moon Island
description:
It is an old school game collection with ten different types of mini-games.
The story tells of a series of wars that took place on the island

Feature：
Starry Moon Island Out Of Control ：It is a horizontal scroll shooting game
Starry Moon Island Red Snake ：It is a Top-Down shooting game
Starry Moon Island Star Ocean： It is a Top-Down shooting game in Space
Starry Moon Island Break Out： It is a Top-Down shooting use Aim game
Starry Moon Island Perimeter： It is a horizontal scroll shooting game in Space
